name: Skyline Event Services
overview:
Successful trade show and event marketing is innovative, interactive, inventive and challenging!

Our group of consultants, designers and technicians will assist your company to excel at this uniquely diverse type of marketing.

Architectural Exhibit Design & Customization

  • Inline & Islands
  • Tabletops
  • Kiosks and Towers
  • Workstations
  • Truss Systems
  • Fabric Structures
  • Exhibit Rentals

Creative & Conceptual Design

  • Murals
  • Detachable Images
  • Banners
  • Digital & Vinyl Production
  • Graphics & Structural Exhibit Design

Exhibit Management Program

  • Web Based Asset Management
  • Installation & Dismantle
  • Storage & Refurbishing
  • Show Service Coordination

Integrated Marketing

  • Pre & Post Show Campaigns
  • Promotional Items
  • Wearables
  • Collateral & Print Materials
  • Training Seminars

You can also view www.skyline.com for more information to expand your knowledge, locate our seminars and inspire your creative design.
